post.title: for sale: vancouver - brand new in box unopened unlocked iphone 4 32gb $1000
post.content: hi, i have a brand new in box sealed unopened iphone 4 32gb for sale for $1000. i will include an unactivated rogers micro-sim for free. local deal and cash only, no deliveries. please do not pm me, text 604-889-8258 thanks alot!
